description:
Akari Yomatsuri, daughter of the Globe commander Nishikubo, joins the team, and everyone enjoys a summer rest in Akihabara.  However, a new foe, Amarock, appears.  Daichi launches in an unrepaired Earth Engine.  Just when he is about to be destroyed, a new Kiltgang, Albion, saves him.
Source: crunchyroll
